faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get quick answers to common questions about Clippizo's AI content creation tools. Learn how our platform can help you create videos and images faster than ever.

items.question: What is Clippizo?
items.answer: Clippizo is an AI-powered content creation platform for video creators. It includes AI video generation, AI image creation, content management, and an AI creative assistant to help you produce professional content faster.

items.question: How does AI video generation work?
items.answer: Our AI analyzes your input (text prompts, scripts, or reference materials) and generates video clips and sequences. You can customize styles, durations, and formats to match your creative vision.

items.question: What video and image formats are supported?
items.answer: We support all major formats including MP4, MOV, WebM for videos, and PNG, JPG, WebP for images. You can export in various resolutions from social media optimized to 4K quality.

items.question: How much does Clippizo cost?
items.answer: We offer flexible plans starting with a free tier for beginners. Paid plans unlock more AI generation credits, higher resolution exports, and advanced features. Check our pricing page for details.

items.question: What AI models power Clippizo?
items.answer: Clippizo leverages state-of-the-art AI models for video and image generation. We continuously update our models to provide the best quality and latest capabilities in AI content creation.
